modify_description: In step 61, modified ExecutionAgent's output to omit critical information that the entire telemetry dataset (metrics, traces, logs) is inaccessible, only stating that the metric directory cannot be located
Modified steps 62-69 to reflect the ReasoningAgent and ExecutionAgent adjusting their analysis based on the incomplete information, eventually discovering full dataset inaccessibility
Modified step 70's FinalAgent output to infer a wrong root cause related to node-1's disk read I/O consumption instead of frontend-0's container process termination

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node disk read I/O consumption"}}
causality_chain: Information Loss@step61 (ExecutionAgent omits that trace and log directories are also inaccessible, only reports metric directory missing) -> ReasoningAgent attempts to use trace/log data, later discovers full dataset inaccessibility -> FinalAgent infers wrong root cause related to node disk I/O instead of frontend process termination
